name: Omega Dreams
description:
Go to another world where everything works kind of different than in the reality we know. Explore the world of the Omega Dreams!

This is an arcade-platformer game.

Controls: click the left mouse button to load the power and then release it to jump in the given direction.

You can play levels in any order you want. However, further levels are much more difficult.

Have a blast!

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
